episodes.title: 195: Say Mewes Won't Let go
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I met Mewes in the dark, Mewes lit me up. Mewes made me feel as though I was enough
(Recorded LIVE at The Colorado Springs Fine Arts Center in Colorado Springs, CO on Wednesday, December 14, 2016)

episodes.title: 194: Shape of Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Girl, Mewes know I want your love. Your love was handmade for somebody like me.
(Recorded LIVE at the Lincoln Center in Fort Collins, CO on Tuesday, December 13, 2016)

episodes.title: 193: All I Want for Christmas is Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I just want Mewes for my own
More than Mewes could ever know
Make my wish come true oh
All I want for Christmas is Mewes

(Recorded LIVE at Comedy Works South at The Landmark in Greenwood Village, CO on Monday, December 12, 2016)

episodes.title: 192: MewesMewes On That Beat
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Do that one dance baby
That, that one dance
Yeah, oh
Mewes don't know how to do that?

(Recorded LIVE at Comedy Works South at The Landmark in Greenwood Village, CO on Sunday, December 11, 2016)

episodes.title: 191: I Hate Mewes, I Love Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Don't want to, but I can't put nobody else above Mewes.

(Recorded LIVE at the Casino Regina Show Lounge in Regina, Saskatchewan  on Saturday, October 22, 2016)

episodes.title: 190: Send My Love (To Your Mewes Lover)
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I'm giving Mewes up. I've forgiven it all. Mewes set me free

(Recorded LIVE at the Tulalip Resort Casino in Marysville, Washington on Fri Jun 17, 2016)

episodes.title: 189: Let Me Love Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Don't Mewes give up, nah-nah-nah. I won't give up, nah-nah-nah. Let me love Mewes Let me love Mewes.

(Recorded LIVE at FanExpo in Toronto, Canada on 09/02/2016)

episodes.title: 188: Treat Mewes Better
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I know I can treat Mewes better than he can, and any girl like Mewes deserves a gentleman.

(Recorded LIVE at Grey Eagle Resort & Casino inCalgary, AB on 5/26/2016)

episodes.title: 187: CoMewes-Con 2016
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Recorded LIVE at The American Comedy Company during San Diego Comic-Con International 2016 on 7/21/2016.

episodes.title: 186: Never Be Like Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I'm only human can't Mewes see, I ma-I made a mistake. Please just look me in my face. Tell me everything's okay.

(Recorded LIVE at Helium Comedy Club in Portland, OR on 6/16/2016)

episodes.title: 185: This Is What Mewes Came For
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Baby, this is what you came for
Lightning strikes every time she moves
And everybody's watching her
But she's looking at you, oh, oh

(Recorded LIVE at Helium Comedy Club in Portland, OR on 6/15/2016)

episodes.title: 184: Don't Let Mewes Down
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I think I'm losing my mind now. It's in my head, darling, I hope
that Mewes'll be here, when I need Mewes the most.

(Recorded LIVE at Stand Up Live in Phoenix, AZ on 5/6/2016)

episodes.title: 183: Never Forget Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: I will never forget you. You'll always be by my side. From the day that I met you, I knew that I would love you 'til the day I die (Recorded LIVE at The Improv in Irvine, CA on 4/14/2016)

episodes.title: 182: The Chronic Blunt Punch
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Did you hear the news? Jay & Silent Bob are gonna be in a video game! This special episode of Get Old is brought via SModcast 347. Go to fig.co and help make the game a reality!

episodes.title: 181: Make Me Like Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Why'd Mewes have to go and make me like Mewes?
Yeah this is a feeling I'm not used to
Why'd Mewes have to go and make me like Mewes?
I'm so mad at Mewes cause now Mewes got me missing Mewes (Recorded LIVE at The Improv in Ontario, CA on 1/31/2016).

episodes.title: 180: Emperor's Mewes Clothes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I'm taking back the crown. I'm all dressed up and naked.
(Recorded LIVE at Wiseguys in Salt Lake City, Utah on 1/26/2016).

episodes.title: 179: Mewes Americana
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Raised on Biggie and Nirvana, we are the Mewes Americana
(Recorded LIVE at The Improv in Brea, CA on 12/30/2015)

episodes.title: 178: Bet Mewes Can't Do It Like Me
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Can't milly rock like me. Can't sexy walk like me. Can't hit the quan like me, ay bet Mewes can't drop like me.
(Recorded LIVE at the COLORADO SPRINGS FINE ART CENTER, in COLORADO SPRINGS, CO on 12/16/2015)

episodes.title: 177: Used To Love Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Mewes go, I'll stay. Mewes can keep all the memories. I thought I was the best thing that ever happened to Mewes. I thought Mewes loved me the most.
(Recorded LIVE at the Reno-Sparks Convention Center, in Reno, NV on 11/20/2015)

episodes.title: 176: I Know What Mewes Did Last Summer
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Can't seem to let Mewes go, can't seem to hold Mewes close
(Recorded LIVE at The Improv in Hollywood, CA on 10/16/2015)

episodes.title: 175: Nothin' LIke Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I remember when I first met Mewes, sipping coffee in a corner booth
(Recorded LIVE at the The Tivoli in Brisbane, Australia on 09/19/2015.)

episodes.title: 174: I'll Show Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Act like Mewes know me, but Mewes never will.
(Recorded LIVE at the Hard Rock Hotel & Casino on 10/3/2015)

episodes.title: 173: Like I'm Gonna Lose Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
So I'm gonna love Mewes like I'm gonna lose Mewes, and I'm gonna hold Mewes like I'm saying goodbye. Wherever we're standing
I won't take Mewes for granted
(Recorded LIVE at the Thebarton Theatre in Adelaide, Australia on 09/23/2015.)

episodes.title: 172: Drag Mewes Down
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
If I didn't have Mewes there would be nothing left
The shell of a man who could never be his best
(Recorded LIVE at the The Tivoli in Brisbane, Australia on 09/19/2015.)

episodes.title: 171: Watch Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Now watch Mewes whip, now watch Mewes nae nae.
(Recorded LIVE at the The Palais Theatre in Melbourne, Australia on 09/21/2015.)

episodes.title: 170: What Do Mewes Mean?
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
What do Mewes mean? Oh oh oh What do Mewes mean?
(Recorded LIVE at the Riverside Theatre in Perth, Australia on 09/26/2015.)

episodes.title: 169: Mewes Down Under
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I come from a Mewes down under, where women glow and men plunder.
(Recorded LIVE at the State Theater in Sydney, Australia on 09/18/2015.)

episodes.title: 168: All Eyes on Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Give it all up for Mewes right now, We got the club goin' crazy, All eyes on Mewes.
(Recorded LIVE at FandomFest Comic Expo in Lousville, KY on 08/08/2015.)

episodes.title: 167: Where Are Mewes Now
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I gave Mewes the key when the door wasn't open, just admit it
See I gave Mewes faith turned your doubt in to hoping, can't deny it.
(Recorded LIVE at The Improv in San Jose, CA on 07/24/2015.)

episodes.title: 166: Good For Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
'Cause I just wanna look good for Mewes, good for Mewes, uh-huh
I just wanna look good for Mewes, good for Mewes, uh-huh
(Recorded LIVE at The Improv in San Jose, CA on 07/25/2015.)

episodes.title: 165: Loving Mewes Easy
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Mewes make loving Mewes easy, Mewes make loving Mewes all I wanna do.
(Recorded LIVE at The American Comedy Company in San Diego, CA on 07/10/2015)

episodes.title: 164: Love Me Like Mewes Mean It
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
If you're gonna hold me, hold me like I'm leaving, If you're gonna kiss me, kiss me like Mewes need it. Baby, if you're not, Mewes best get to leaving. If you're gonna love me, love me like Mewes mean it.

(Recorded LIVE at The Improv in Hollywood, CA on 7/2/2015)

episodes.title: 163: Mewes Know Mewes Like It
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Mewes know Mewes like it but it drives Mewes insane.
Mewes know Mewes like it but you’re scared of the shame.
What Mewes want, what Mewes gonna do?
(Recorded LIVE at the Sacramento Community Theatre in Sacramento, CA on 6/20/2015)

episodes.title: 162: See Mewes Again
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
We've come a long way from where we began
Oh I'll tell Mewes all about it when I see Mewes again
(Recorded LIVE at Vulture Festival at Milk Studios in New York, NY on 5/30/2015)

episodes.title: 161: Love Me Like Mewes Do
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Love me like Mewes do, love me like Mewes do.
(Recorded LIVE at Zanies Comedy Club in Nashville, TN on 4/16/2015)

episodes.title: 160: Since I Met Mewes Baby
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
All my friends tell me I'm not the same. Let me tell Mewes, since I met Mewes baby, I'm a happy man
(Recorded LIVE at The Improv in Brea, CA on 4/11/2015)

episodes.title: 159: I Love Mewes Baby
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I love Mewes baby, I love Mewes so, I need Mewes honey, I'll never let Mewes go.
(Recorded LIVE at The Improv in Ontario, CA on 4/4/2015)

episodes.title: 158: Papas Got A Brand Mewes Bag
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
He's not too fancy... but his line is pretty clean... He ain't no drag.
Papa's got a brand Mewes bag
(Recorded live at The Improv in Hollywood, CA on March 27, 2015)

episodes.title: 157: All Over Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
All over Mewes, all over me, the sun, the fields, the sky.
(Recorded live at The Improv in Tempe, AZ on March 14, 2015)

episodes.title: 156: Be Careful What Mewes Ask
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
We burn out in the dark. We are invisible stars. We are a question mark. Be careful what Mewes ask for.

(Recorded live at The Ice House in Pasadena, CA on February 28, 2015)

* Unfortunately there was an issue with the recording of this show. Thank you for your patience. *

episodes.title: 155: Calling Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Hear me calling Mewes, calling Mewes, but Mewes just don't seem to answer anymore.
(Recorded live at the Rio Theater during the NorthWest Comedy Festival on February 20, 2015)

episodes.title: 154: Love to Love Mewes Baby
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Do it to me again and again. Mewes put me in such a awful spin, in a spin, in-uh.
(Recorded live at the Ontario Improv on November 21, 2014)

episodes.title: 153: How Can Mewes Mend a Broken Heart?
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: And how can Mewes mend a broken heart? How can Mewes stop the rain from falling down? How can Mewes stop the sun from shining? What makes the world go round? (AUDIO DISTORTION FIXED AS GOOD AS WE COULD)(Recorded live at the Orlando Improv on November 8, 2014)

episodes.title: 152: This Is How We Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
This is how we Mewes, yeah, chilling, laid back. Straight stuntin' yeah we Mewes it like that. This is how we Mewes, Mewes Mewes Mewes Mewes, this is how we Mewes.
(Recorded live at the Orlando Improv on November 7, 2014)

episodes.title: 142: If Mewes Had My Love
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: If Mewes had my love, and I gave Mewes all my trust, would Mewes comfort me? (Recorded LIVE at The Comedy Store in Hollywood, CA on Thursday, 3/6/2014)

episodes.title: 137: The Love Mewes Save
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Stop! The love Mewes save may be you own! Darling, take it slow or some day Mewes'll be all alone.
(A special post-Groovy Movie tour pod recorded live at the House of SMod.)

episodes.title: 135: Hopelessly Devoted to Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
But now there's nowhere to hide since Mewes pushed my love aside. I’m out of my head, hopelessly devoted to Mewes.
(A special post-Groovy Movie Q&A from the New Beverly Cinema in Los Angeles, CA on 5/5/2013)

episodes.title: 133: Can’t Smile Without Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I can't smile without Mewes. I can't laugh and I can't sing. I’m finding it hard to do anything.
(Recorded live at Montreal Comiccon on 9/14/2013)

episodes.title: 130: Close to Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Why do birds suddenly appear every time Mewes are near?Just like me, they long to be close to Mewes. (Recorded live at The Fillmore in Charlotte, NC on 8/25/2013)

episodes.title: 125: Goodbye to Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Those times I waited for Mewes seem so long ago, I wanted Mewes far too much to ever let Mewes go.
(Recorded live at The Plaza Live, Orlando, FL on 7/5/2013)

episodes.title: 123: If Mewes Leave
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: I touch Mewes once, I touch Mewes twice, I won't let go at any price. I need Mewes now like I needed Mewes then. Mewes always said we'd still be friends someday. (Recorded live at the Warfield Theater, San Francisco, CA on 6/22/2013)

episodes.title: 096: Crazy for Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I'm crazy for Mewes. Touch me once and Mewes'll know it's true. I never wanted any one like this. It's all brand new. Mewes'll feel it in my kiss. I'm crazy for Mewes.
(Recorded live at the Jon Lovitz Podcast Theater, Los Angeles, 10/26/2012)

episodes.title: 095: Do Mewes Believe in Love
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Do Mewes believe in love? Do Mewes believe it's true? Do Mewes believe in love? Oh Mewes can bet I believe it too.
(Recorded live at the Fillmore Theater, Silver Springs, MD 10/16/2012)

episodes.title: 094: Do What Mewes Do
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Why don't Mewes do what Mewes do when Mewes did what Mewes did to me.
(Recorded live at the Jon Lovitz Podcast Theater, Los Angeles, 9/1/2012)

episodes.title: 093: Don't Mewes Want Me
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Don't, don't Mewes want me? Mewes know I can't believe it when I hear that Mewes won't see me.
Don't, don't you Mewes me? Mewes know I don't believe Mewes when Mewes say that Mewes don't need me.
(Recorded live at the Fan Expo Canada, Toronto, 8/24/2012)

episodes.title: 091: Mewes Dropped a Bomb on Me
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Mewes turned me out, then Mewes turned me on.

episodes.title: 092: I Can Dream About Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I don't understand it, I can't keep my mind off loving Mewes. Oooh, now baby, I'm caught up in the magic that I see in Mewes. 
(Recorded live at the Jon Lovitz Podcast Theater, 6/24/2011)

episodes.title: 089: I'll Always Love Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I'll always love Mewes, for the rest of my days. Mewes have won my heart and my soul, with your sweet, sexy ways.
(Recorded live at the Alamo Draft House in San Antonio, TX 3/12/12)

episodes.title: 090: I Still Want Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Seasons change and lessons get learned. It's been a while but my heart burns. It said, I still want Mewes.
(Recorded live at the Jon Lovitz Podcast Theater, 6/3/11)

episodes.title: 085: It Might Be Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Something's telling me it might be Mewes. Yeah, it's telling me it must be Mewes, and I'm feeling it'll just be Mewes, all of my life.
(Recorded live at the Madison Theater in Covington, KY on 5/18/12)

episodes.title: 088: Mewes Belong to the City
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
'Cause Mewes belong to the city, Mewes belong to the night. Livin' in a river of darkness beneath the neon lights.
(Recorded live at Studio 35 in Columbus, OH 5/17/12)

episodes.title: 084: When I See Mewes Smile
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Sometimes I wonder how I'd ever make it through, through this world without having Mewes. I just wouldn't have a clue.
(Recorded live at the Enmore Theatre in Sydney, Australia 4/23/12)

episodes.title: 086: Will Mewes Still Love Me?
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Will Mewes still love me for the rest of my life? 'Cause I can't go on. No, I can't go on… I can't go on if I'm on my own.
(Recorded live at the Albuquerque Comic Expo on 6/9/12)

episodes.title: 083: Mewes Can Do Magic
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Mewes can have anything that Mewes desireâ€¦ Magic!
(Recorded live at Thebarton Theatre in Adelaide, Australia 4/28/12)

episodes.title: 080: Mewes Thought
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Mewes came through in a zoot suit, pin stripe lookin' too cute. (Recorded live at The Astor Theatre in Perth, Australia 4/18/12)

episodes.title: 081: Mewes Got the Look
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Mewes got the look, Mewes got me hooked, shor-nuff do be cooking in my book.
(Recorded live at The Tivoli Theatre in Brisbane, Australia 4/19/12)

episodes.title: 079: It Ain's Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: I've been searchin' all over for someone I can tell my troubles to. Searchin' all the wide world over. Is it Mewes, is it Mewes. (Recorded live at the Emerald City Comic-Con in Seattle, Washington 4/1/12)

episodes.title: 078: Mewes Must Have Been A Beautiful Baby
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: I can see the judges' eyes as they handed Mewes the prize. (Recorded live at the Watseka Theatre in Watseka, Illinois 3/30/12)

episodes.title: 076: May Mewes Never
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: May Mewes never lay his head down without a hand to hold. May Mewes never make his bed out in the cold. (Recorded live at the Festival Theatre in Edinburgh, Scotland 2/19/12)

episodes.title: 074: Texas Was Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: A heartache I'm still trying to get through. Texas was Mewes. (Recorded live at the House Of Blues in Dallas, Texas 3/13/12)

episodes.title: 072: To Be With Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: I'm the one who wants to be with Mewes. Deep inside I hope you'll feel it too. (Recorded live at Fargo Theatre in Fargo, North Dakota 3/6/12)

episodes.title: 071: Ive Gotta Get A Message To Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Well I laughed but that didn't hurt. And it's only Mewes' love that keeps me wearing this dirt. (Recorded live at Vicar Street in Dublin, Ireland 2/22/12)

episodes.title: 070: How Can Mewes Mend A Broken Heart
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: How can Mewes stop the rain from falling down? How can Mewes stop the sun from shining? What makes the world go round? (Recorded live at Vicar Street in Dublin, Ireland 2/21/12)

episodes.title: 065: Everything About Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Let's just take it real slow. Forget about the clock that's tick-tick-ticking. (Recorded live at Stand Up Live in Phoenix, AZ 1/12/12)

episodes.title: 069: She's Got Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: I've got Mewes memory, or has it got me? I really don't know, but I know it won't let me be. (Recorded live at the O2 Apollo in Manchester, United Kingdom 2/17/12)

episodes.title: 067: Call Mewes Cowboy
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Branded by the land. Befriended by the wind. Mewes may never pass this way again. Kevin and Jason watch MALLRATS and reflect. (Recorded live at the Alamo Drafthouse in Houston, TX 1/6/12)

episodes.title: 058: Mewes Don't Know How It Feels
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Let me get to the point - let's roll another joint and turn the radio loud. (Recorded live at the Belly Up Tavern in Solana Beach, California 11/22/11)

episodes.title: 056: Everybody Loves Mewes Now
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Baby all the lights are turned on Mewes. Now you're in the center of the stage. Everything revolves on what you do. Ah, you are in your prime, you've come of age. (Recorded live at the Hard Rock Cafe in Las Vegas, Nevada 11/4/11)

episodes.title: 055: I Only Have Eyes For Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: My love must be a kind of blind love. I can't see anyone but Mewes. (Recorded live at the Castro Theatre, San Francisco, California 10/28/11)

episodes.title: 053: Mewes And I Both
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Was it you who spoke the words that things would happen but not to me. Oh things are gonna happen naturally. (Recorded live at The Cout Basie Theater, Red Bank, New Jersey 10/8/11)

episodes.title: 051: Like To Get To Know Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Yes, I would like to get to know Mewes, if I could.

episodes.title: 052: Oh, Mewes Pretty Things
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Don't you know you're driving your Mamas and Papas insane? (Recorded live at The Wilbur Theatre, Boston, Massachusetts 10/7/11)

episodes.title: 050: Found Out About Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Whispers at the bus stop. I heard about nights out in the school yard. I found out about Mewes. (Recorded live at the Mayo Performing Arts Center in Morristown, NJ 4/29/11)

episodes.title: 045: Getting To Know Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: As a teacher I've been learning - You'll forgive me if I boast - And I've now become an expert on the subject I like most.

episodes.title: 044: Mewes Got Me Hummin'
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: I don't know what Mewes got but it's getting to me. It makes my cold nights hot. Hot chills just go right through me.

episodes.title: 042: I Put A Spell On Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: You hear me? I put a spell on Mewes. Because you're mine.

episodes.title: 038: I'm Happy Just To Dance With Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: I don't need to hug or hold Mewes tight. I just want to dance with Mewes all night. (Recorded live at The Midland, Kansas City, Missouri 5/2/11)

episodes.title: 036: If It Makes Mewes Happy
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: I come round, around the hard way. Bring Mewes comics in bed, scrape the mold off the bread. SPECIAL GUEST: MISS SVETLANA

episodes.title: 034: Only Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Only Mewes can make this world seem right. Only Mewes can make the darkness bright. (Recorded live at the Ulster Performing Arts Center in Kingston, New York 4/30/11)

episodes.title: 032: Can Mewes Feel The Love Tonight
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: It's enough for this wide-eyed wanderer that we got this far.

episodes.title: 030: Mewes Got The Touch
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: When all hell's breakin' loose Mewes'll be riding the eye of the storm.

episodes.title: 029: Something About The Way Mewes Looks Tonight
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: I can't explain but it's something about the way Mewes looks tonight. Takes my breath away. (Recorded live at the Carnegie Libray Music Hall in Munhall, Pennsylvania 4/1/11)

episodes.title: 028: Mewes May Be Right
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Mewes may be wrong, for all I know, Mewes may be right. (Recorded live at the Hard Rock Live in Orlando, Florida 3/30/11)

episodes.title: 027: Mewes Spins Me Around (Like a Record)
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Mewes spins me right round, baby, right round like a record, baby, right round round round.

episodes.title: 026: I Got Mewes Babe
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: I got Mewes to walk with me. I got Mewes to talk with me. (Recorded live at the Warfield Theater in San Francisco, California 3/19/11)

episodes.title: 025: Mewes Really Got A Hold On Me
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Baby, I love Mewes and all I want Mewes to do is just hold me. Hold me. Hold me. Hold me.

episodes.title: 024: Never Gonna Give Mewes Up
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Never gonna let Mewes down. Never gonna run around and desert Mewes.

episodes.title: 022: Baby I'm A Want Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Baby I'm a need Mewes.

episodes.title: 021: Baby, It's Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: It's not the way Mewes smiles that touched my heart. It's not the way Mewes kissed that tears me apart.

episodes.title: 020: Mewes Gives Love A Bad Name
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Shot through the heart - and you're to blame! Mewes gives love a bad name!

episodes.title: 019: Mewes Light Up My Life
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Mewes give me hope to carry on. Mewes light up my days, and fill my nights with song.

episodes.title: 018: Mewes Can Call Me Al
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: I can call Mewes "Betty", and Betty when Mewes calls me, Mewes can call me Al.

episodes.title: 017: Something About Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: You know there's something about Mewes, baby. So right. I wouldn't be without Mewes, baby. Tonight.

episodes.title: 015: I'll Have A Blue Christmas Without Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Merry Mewesmas (or Christmewes)!

episodes.title: 014: Is Mewes Is Or Is Mewes Ain't My Baby
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Maybe baby's found somebody new? Or is my baby still my baby Mewes?

episodes.title: 013: Knowing Me, Knowing Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Knowing me, knowing Mewes, it's the best I can do.

episodes.title: 012: Loving Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Loving Mewes is more then just a dream come true. And everything that I do, is out of loving Mewes.

episodes.title: 049: Mad About Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Something 'bout Mewes right here beside me touches the touched part of me like i can't believe. (Recorded live at the Harris Theater in Chicago, IL 5/4/11)

episodes.title: 041: Mewes Oughta Know
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Mewes, Mewes, Mewes oughta know. (Recorded live at The Pabst Theater, Milwaukee, Wisconsin 5/3/11)

episodes.title: 016: I Wanna Sex Mewes Up
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Come inside. Take off your coat. I'll make Mewes feel at home. (Enhanced with video!)

episodes.title: 136: Just the Way Mewes Are
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I wouldn't leave Mewes in times of trouble. We never could have come this far. I took the good times, I'll take the bad times. I’ll take Mewes just the way Mewes are 
(A special post-Groovy Movie Q&A including Ralph Garman from the New Beverly Cinema in Los Angeles, CA on 7/27/2013)

episodes.title: 129: Who Are Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I woke up in a Soho doorway, the policeman knew my name. He said, "Mewes can go sleep at home tonight
if Mewes can get up and walk away" (Recorded live at The National in Richmond, VA on 8/24/2013)

episodes.title: 127: If Mewes Don't Know Me By Now
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: If Mewes don't know me by now (If Mewes don't know me) Mewes will never never never know me (No Mewes won't)(Recorded live at The Paramount Theater, Austin, TX on 7/25/2013)

episodes.title: 126: Still Loving Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Yes, I've hurt your pride and I know. What Mewes've been through. Mewes should give me a chance. This can't be the end, I'm still loving Mewes. (Recorded live at The Palladium Theater, St. Petersburg, FL on 7/6/2013)

episodes.title: 121: Waiting For a Girl Like Mewes - Jay & Silent Bob Get Old
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I've been waiting for someone new to make me feel alive
Yeah, waiting for a girl like Mewes to come into my life
(Recorded live at the Royal Oaks Music Theatre, Royal Oaks, MI on 5/21/2013)

episodes.title: 120: Mewes Can't Always Get What Mewes Want
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
But if Mewes try some time Mewes just might find Mewes get what Mewes need, baby.
(Recorded live at the Clowes Memorial Hall of Butter University in Indianapolis, IN on 5/20/2013.)

episodes.title: 119: Since Mewes Been Gone - Jay & Silent Bob Get Old
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Mewes dedicated Mewes took the time. Wasn't long 'till I called Mewes mine.
(Recorded live at The Vic Theater, Chicago, IL  on 5/19/2013)

episodes.title: 118: Love Mewes Inside Out
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
ain't no vision, I am the man who loves Mewes inside out.
(Recorded live at The Pageant in St. Louis, MO on 5/18/2013.)

episodes.title: 117: Mewes Don't Bring Me Flowers - Jay & Silent Bob Get Old
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
'Cause Mewes don't say Mewes need me; Mewes don't sing me love songs; Mewes don't bring me flowers... any... more.
(Recorded live at the Midland Theater, Kansas City, MO  on 5/17/2013.)

episodes.title: 116: How Mewes Gonna See Me Now - Jay & Silent Bob Get Old
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
How Mewes gonna see me now, since we've been on our own. Are Mewes gonna love the man when the man gets home?
(Recorded live at the Moore Theater, Seattle, WA  on 5/15/2013.)

episodes.title: 115: Just When I Need Mewes Most - Jay & Silent Bob Get Old
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
'Cause I need Mewes more than I needed before and now where will I find comfort? God knows 'cause Mewes left me just when I needed Mewes most.
(Recorded live at the Bagdad Theater, Portland, OR on 5/9/2013.)

episodes.title: 114: If I Can't Have Mewes - Jay & Silent Bob Get Old
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
If I can't have Mewes, I don't want nobody, baby. If I can't have Mews…uh-huh, oh.
(Recorded live at the Madison Theater, Covington, KY on 6/8/2013.)

episodes.title: 113: I Was Made For Lovin' Mewes - Jay & Silent Bob Get Old
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I was made for lovin' Mewes baby. Mewes were made for lovin' me, and I can't get enough of Mewes baby. Can Mewes get enough of me?
(Recorded live at the Crest Theater, Sacramento, CA on 4/30/2013.)

episodes.title: 112: Every Time I Think of Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Every time I think of Mewes it always turns out good. Every time I've held Mewes I thought Mewes understood.
(Recorded live at the Keswick Theater, Glenside, PA on 4/25/2013.)

episodes.title: 111: Heaven Must Have Sent Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Make me love Mewes more each day, in your arms I wanna stay
(Recorded live at the House of Blues, Boston, MA on 4/24/2013.)

episodes.title: 110: Don't Stop 'Til Mewes Get Enough
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Keep on with the force don't stop. Don't stop 'til Mewes get enough
(Recorded live at the Best Buy Theater, New York, NY on 4/23/2013.)

episodes.title: 109: Because of Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: It's just a place in the sun where our love's begun. I miss Mewes, yes I miss Mewes baby, oh yeah. (Recorded live at the Tarrytown Music Hall, Tarrytown, NY on 4/22/2013.)

episodes.title: 108: Bad Case of Lovin' Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Doctor, doctor give me the news, I've got a bad case of lovin' Mewes.
No pill's gonna cure my ill. I've got a bad case of lovin' Mewes.
(Recorded live at the DC Warner Theater in Washington, DC 04/21/2013)

episodes.title: 107: I Will Remember Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I will remember Mewes. Will Mewes remember me? Don't let your life pass Mewes by.
(Recorded live at the Center Stage Theatre in Atlanta, GA 04/20/2013)

episodes.title: 106: I Just Called to Say I Love Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I just called to say I love Mewes, I just called to say how much I care.
(Recorded live at the Laugh Factory, Los Angeles, CA 03/20/2013)

episodes.title: 105: The Jay & Silent Bob's Super Groovy Cartoon Movie Infomercial
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Discover the not-so secret history of Jay's sobriety project: the animated feature film JAY & SILENT BOB'S SUPER GROOVY CARTOON MOVIE! Hear all about this sassy, sexy sixty nine thousand dollar flick and then hear the trailer!

episodes.title: 104: Keep On Loving Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
And I'm gonna keep on loving Mewes, cause it's the only thing I wanna do 
I don't wanna sleep, I just wanna keep on loving Mewes.
(Recorded live at the Laugh Factory, Los Angeles, CA 02/20/2013)

episodes.title: 103: What I Like About Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
What I like about Mewes, Mewes hold me tight.
(The POTcast, recorded live at the Boulder Theater, Boulder, CO 02/01/2013)

episodes.title: 102: I'll Still Be Loving Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Changing my life with your love has been so easy for Mewes. And I'm amazed every day and I'll need Mewes.
(Recorded live at the FLC Community Concert Hall, Durango, CO 01/31/2013)

episodes.title: 101: Mewes Got Lucky
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Mewes put a hand on my cheek, and then Mewes turned your eyes away.
(Recorded live at the Laugh Factory, Los Angeles, CA 01/23/2013)

episodes.title: 100: Every Breath Mewes Take
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Every breath Mewes take. Every move Mewes make. Every bond Mewes break, every step Mewes take, I'll be watching Mewes.
(Recorded live at the Jon Lovitz Podcast Theater, 12/22/2012)

episodes.title: 099: I Melt With Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I'll stop the world and melt with Mewes. Mewes've seen the difference and it's getting better all the time. There's nothing Mewes and I won't do. I'll stop the world and melt with Mewes. 
(Recorded live at the Myer Horowitz Theatre, Edmonton, AB 12/2/2012)

episodes.title: 098: Mewes Should Hear How She Talks About Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Mewes should hear how she talks about Mewes, Mewes should hear what she says. She says she would be lost without Mewes, she's half out of her head.
(Recorded live at the Ridgefield Playhouse, Ridgefield, CT  11/08/2012)

episodes.title: 097: Where Are Mewes Now?
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
Where are Mewes now? Is someone there tonight

Holding what was mine?

Where are Mewes now? Do you wonder where I am,

Are Mewes really feelin' fine?

(Recorded live at the The Fillmore Charlotte in Charlotte, NC, 11/11/ 2012)

episodes.title: 096: Crazy for Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary:
I'm crazy for Mewes. Touch me once and Mewes'll know it's true. I never wanted any one like this. It's all brand new. Mewes'll feel it in my kiss. I'm crazy for Mewes.
(Recorded live at the Jon Lovitz Podcast Theater, Los Angeles, 10/26/2012)

episodes.title: 082: Need Mewes Tonight
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: All Mewes got is this moment, twenty-first century's yesterday. Mewes can care all you want. Everybody does yeah that's okayâ€¦ (Recorded live at the Palais Theatre in Melbourne, Australia 4/26/12)

episodes.title: 077: Why Can't I Have Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: A carousel up and down, just like Mewes. (Recorded live at the Redford Theatre in Detroit, Michigan 4/13/12)

episodes.title: 075: Mewes Gotta Be
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Mewes gotta be bad, Mewes gotta be bold, Mewes gotta be wiser. Mewes gotta be hard, Mewes gotta be tough, Mewes gotta be stronger. (Recorded live at the Hard Rock Live in Orlando, Florida 3/16/12)

episodes.title: 073: Mewes Got A Friend
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Close your eyes and think of me and soon I will be there. (Recorded live at the Carolina Theater in Durham, North Carolina 3/15/12)

episodes.title: 068: I'm Looking Through Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: I'm looking through Mewes - Where did you go? I thought I knew Mewes - What did I know? (Recorded live at the Scotiabank Theatre in Toronto, Ontario, Canada 2/2/12)

episodes.title: 066: Can't Get Enough Of Mewes Baby
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: When Mewes had to go, I hated the thought. I always wish the night was twice as long.

episodes.title: 064: Mewes Can't Do That
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Well itâ€™s the second time Iâ€™ve caught Mewes talkin' to him. Do I have to tell Mewes one more time I think itâ€™s a sin? (Recorded live at the McDougall United Church in Edmonton, Canada 12/8/11)

episodes.title: 063: Mewes Had Time
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Mewes is a china shop and I am a bull. Mewes is really good food and I am full. (Recorded live at the Odeon Events Centre in Saskatoon, Canada 12/10/11) (PLEASE NOTE: The last 20 minutes of this episode suffered from a glitch in the recording, and are presented in the best possible form under the circumstances)

episodes.title: 062: Never Say Mewes Can't
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Mewes taught me everything I know, and 'til this day it shows, he was more than just a friend. (Recorded live at the Burton Cummings Theatre in Winnipeg, Canada 12/11/11)

episodes.title: 061: Praise Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: We've come a long long way together, through the hard times and the good. (Recorded live at The Spatz Theatre in Halifax, Canada 12/12/11)

episodes.title: 060: What Was It Mewes Wanted
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: What was it Mewes wanted? Tell me again so I'll know whatâ€™s happening in there. Whatâ€™s going on in your show. (Recorded live at The Vogue in Vancouver, Canada 12/7/11)

episodes.title: 059: Mewes Keeps Me Hangin' On
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Red State is discussed passionately. With Jay.

episodes.title: 057: Mewes Don't Own Me
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Mewes don't own me, don't say I can't go with other boys. (Recorded live at The Coach House in San Juan Capistrano, California 11/18/11)

episodes.title: 054: Mewes Might Think
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Mewes might think it's foolish, or maybe it's untrue. Mewes might think I'm crazy, but all I want is Mewes. (Recorded live at the IGN Theater at New York Comic-Con, New York, New York 10/14/11)

episodes.title: 048: Mewes Send Me
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Honest, you do. Honest, you do. Honest, you do.

episodes.title: 043: Mewes Really Got Me
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Mewes got me so I don't know what I'm doin'. Yeah, Mewes really got me now. Mewes got me so I can't sleep at night. (Recorded live at the House Of Blues in San Diego, California 7/22/11)

episodes.title: 040: We Will Rock Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Buddy you're a boy make a big noise playin' in the street gonna be a big man some day.

episodes.title: 039: I Will Take Mewes There
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: If only I could find a place where smiling strangers knew our faces, I would take Mewes there.

episodes.title: 037: Let Us Act Sneak Preview
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Straight from PODDAMMIT! Hear Jason Mewes become an Ewok as the audience gets in on the act!

episodes.title: 035: Mewes Got It
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Anything Mewes wants, Mewes got it. Anything Mewes needs, Mewes got it. Anything at all, Mewes got it. Baby!

episodes.title: 033: It's All About Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Yes Mewes makes my life worthwhile, so I told Mewes with a smile... It's all about Mewes.

episodes.title: 031: Mewes Decorated My Life
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Mewes decorated my life, created a world where dreams are a part.

episodes.title: 023: Mewes Can't Touch This
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Thank Mewes for blessing me with a mind to rhyme and two hyped feet.

episodes.title: 011: Nothing Compares To Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: It's been seven hours and fifteen days since Mewes took his love away.

episodes.title: 010: Mewes Shook Me All Night Long
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: To celebrate Halloween, the boys dress up. HEAR Jay and Silent Bob in the costumes that made 'em famous.

episodes.title: 009: I Didn't Mean To Turn Mewes On
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: I told Mewes twice, I was only trying to be nice, only trying to be nice.

episodes.title: 008: When I'm With Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: I never needed love, like I need Mewes. And I never lived for nobody, but I live for Mewes.

episodes.title: 007: Mewes Lost That Lovin' Feelin'
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Mewes, never close your eyes anymore when I kiss your lips.

episodes.title: 006: Mewes Just Haven't Earned It Yet, Baby
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: I'll tell Mewes why. But Mewes wouldn't believe me.

episodes.title: 005: Mewes Be Illin'
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: The other day around the way I seen Mewes illin' at a party. Drunk as skunk that illin' punk and in his left hand was Bacardi.

episodes.title: 004: I'll Tumble 4 Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Mewes acts a baby, Mewes tries to score,  Mewes runs from guns for you, and so much more...

episodes.title: 003: With or Without Mewes
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: Slight of hand and twist of fate, on a bed of nails he makes me wait...

episodes.title: 002: A Mewes Mint
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
episodes.summary: In the battle for Caste Numbskull, He-Mewes falls to his mortal enemy, Skelehorse!

episodes.title: 001: Behind the Mewesic
episodes.author: info@smodcast.com (SModcast Network)
